level.heading: Effective time and date.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in this title and subject to § 29-102.05(d), an entity filing shall be effective:
On the date and at the time of its filing by the Mayor as provided in § 29-102.06;
On the date of filing and at the time specified in the entity filing as its effective time, if later than the time under paragraph (1) of this section;
If permitted by this title, at a specified delayed effective time and date, which shall not be more than 90 days after the date of filing; or
If a delayed effective date as permitted by this title is specified, but no time is specified, at 12:01 a.m. on the date specified, which may not be more than 90 days after the date of filing.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "this title" for "§ 29-102.04" and "§ 29-102.05(d)" for "§ 29 102.05(c)" in the introductory language; and added "which may not be more than 90 days after the date of filing" at the end of (4).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
